verses.verse: Under <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G3739><s%> circumstances, <S%G1722><s%> after so many <S%G3461><s%> thousands <S%G3461><s%> of the multitude <S%G3793><s%> had gathered <S%G1996><s%> together <S%G1996><s%> that they were stepping <S%G2662><s%> on one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> He began <S%G757><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples <S%G3101><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> [of all,] "Beware <S%G4337><s%> of the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is hypocrisy. <S%G5272><s%>
"But there is nothing <S%G3762><s%> covered <S%G4780><s%> up that will not be revealed, <S%G601><s%> and hidden <S%G2927><s%> that will not be known. <S%G1097><s%>

"Accordingly, <S%G473><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> you have said <S%G3004><s%> in the dark <S%G4653><s%> shall be heard <S%G191><s%> in the light, <S%G5457><s%> and what <S%G3739><s%> you have whispered <S%G2980><s%> <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3775><s%> in the inner <S%G5009><s%> rooms <S%G5009><s%> shall be proclaimed <S%G2784><s%> upon the housetops. <S%G1430><s%>

"And I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, My friends, <S%G5384><s%> do not be afraid <S%G5399><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who kill <S%G615><s%> the body, <S%G4983><s%> and after <S%G3326><s%> that have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100><s%> more <S%G4057><s%> that they can do. <S%G4160><s%>

"But I will warn <S%G5263><s%> you whom <S%G5101><s%> to fear: <S%G5399><s%> fear <S%G5399><s%> the One who after <S%G3326><s%> He has killed <S%G615><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> to cast <S%G1685><s%> into hell; <S%G1067><s%> yes, <S%G3483><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, fear <S%G5399><s%> Him!

"Are not five <S%G4002><s%> sparrows <S%G4765><s%> sold <S%G4453><s%> for two <S%G1417><s%> cents <S%G787><s%>? And [yet] not one <S%G1520><s%> of them is forgotten <S%G1950><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

"Indeed, <S%G235><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the very <S%G2532><s%> hairs <S%G2359><s%> of your head <S%G2776><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> numbered. <S%G705><s%> Do not fear; <S%G5399><s%> you are of more <S%G1308><s%> value <S%G1308><s%> than many <S%G4183><s%> sparrows. <S%G4765><s%>

"And I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, everyone <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> confesses <S%G3670><s%> Me before <S%G1715><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> shall confess <S%G3670><s%> him also <S%G2532><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>
but he who denies <S%G720><s%> Me before <S%G1715><s%> men <S%G444><s%> shall be denied <S%G533><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

"And everyone <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> will speak <S%G3004><s%> a word <S%G3056><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man, <S%G444><s%> it shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> him; but he who blasphemes <S%G987><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> it shall not be forgiven <S%G863><s%> him.

"And when <S%G3752><s%> they bring <S%G1533><s%> you before <S%G1909><s%> the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> and the rulers <S%G746><s%> and the authorities, <S%G1849><s%> do not become anxious <S%G3309><s%> about how <S%G4459><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you should speak <S%G626><s%> in your defense, <S%G626><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you should say; <S%G3004><s%>
for the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> will teach <S%G1321><s%> you in that very <S%G846><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> you ought <S%G1163><s%> to say. <S%G3004><s%> "

And someone <S%G5100><s%> in the crowd <S%G3793><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> my brother <S%G80><s%> to divide <S%G3307><s%> the [family] inheritance <S%G2817><s%> with me."
But He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Man, <S%G444><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> appointed <S%G2525><s%> Me a judge <S%G2923><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> arbiter <S%G3312><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> you?"

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Beware, <S%G3708><s%> and be on your guard <S%G5442><s%> against <S%G575><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> form <S%G3956><s%> of greed; <S%G4124><s%> for not [even] when <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> has <S%G4052><s%> an abundance <S%G4052><s%> does his life <S%G2222><s%> consist <S%G1510><s%> of his possessions. <S%G5225><s%>"

And He told <S%G3004><s%> them a parable, <S%G3850><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The land <S%G5561><s%> of a certain <S%G5100><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> man <S%G444><s%> was very <S%G2164><s%> productive. <S%G2164><s%>

"And he began reasoning <S%G1260><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'What <S%G5101><s%> shall I do, <S%G4160><s%> since <S%G3754><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> place <S%G4226><s%> to store <S%G4863><s%> my crops <S%G2590><s%>?'

"And he said, <S%G3004><s%> 'This <S%G3778><s%> is what I will do: <S%G4160><s%> I will tear <S%G2507><s%> down <S%G2507><s%> my barns <S%G596><s%> and build <S%G3618><s%> larger <S%G3173><s%> ones, <S%G3173><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> I will store <S%G4863><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> my grain <S%G4621><s%> and my goods. <S%G18><s%>

'And I will say <S%G3004><s%> to my soul, <S%G5590><s%> "Soul, <S%G5590><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> goods <S%G18><s%> laid <S%G2749><s%> up for many <S%G4183><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> [to come;] take <S%G373><s%> your ease, <S%G373><s%> eat, <S%G2068><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> [and] be merry. <S%G2165><s%>"'

"But God <S%G2316><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'You fool! <S%G878><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> [very] night <S%G3571><s%> your soul <S%G5590><s%> is required <S%G523><s%> of you; and [now] who <S%G5101><s%> will own what <S%G3739><s%> you have prepared <S%G2090><s%>?'
"So <S%G3779><s%> is the man who lays <S%G2343><s%> up treasure <S%G2343><s%> for himself, <S%G848><s%> and is not rich <S%G4147><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>"

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "For this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, do not be anxious <S%G3309><s%> for [your] life, <S%G5590><s%> [as to] what <S%G5101><s%> you shall eat; <S%G2068><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> for your body, <S%G4983><s%> [as to] what <S%G5101><s%> you shall put <S%G1746><s%> on.
"For life <S%G5590><s%> is more <S%G4183><s%> than food, <S%G5160><s%> and the body <S%G4983><s%> than clothing. <S%G1742><s%>

"Consider <S%G2657><s%> the ravens, <S%G2876><s%> for they neither <S%G3777><s%> sow <S%G4687><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> reap; <S%G2325><s%> and they have no <S%G3756><s%> storeroom <S%G5009><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> barn; <S%G596><s%> and [yet] God <S%G2316><s%> feeds <S%G5142><s%> them; how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> valuable <S%G1308><s%> you are than the birds! <S%G4071><s%>
"And which <S%G5101><s%> of you by being anxious <S%G3309><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> add <S%G4369><s%> a [single] cubit <S%G4083><s%> to his life's span <S%G2244><s%>?

"If <S%G1487><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> you cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3761><s%> do even <S%G3761><s%> a very <S%G1646><s%> little <S%G1646><s%> thing, <S%G1646><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> are you anxious <S%G3309><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> other <S%G3062><s%> matters <S%G3062><s%>?

"Consider <S%G2657><s%> the lilies, <S%G2918><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they grow; <S%G837><s%> they neither <S%G3777><s%> toil <S%G2872><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> spin; <S%G3514><s%> but I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, even <S%G3761><s%> Solomon <S%G4672><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> his glory <S%G1391><s%> did not clothe <S%G4016><s%> himself like <S%G5613><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of these. <S%G3778><s%>

"But if <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> arrays <S%G7009><s%> the grass <S%G5528><s%> in the field, <S%G68><s%> which is [alive] today <S%G4594><s%> and tomorrow <S%G839><s%> is thrown <S%G906><s%> into the furnace, <S%G2823><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> [will He clothe] you, O men <S%G3640><s%> of little <S%G3640><s%> faith! <S%G3640><s%>
"And do not seek <S%G2212><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you shall eat, <S%G2068><s%> and what <S%G5101><s%> you shall drink, <S%G4095><s%> and do not keep worrying. <S%G3349><s%>

"For all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> eagerly <S%G1934><s%> seek; <S%G1934><s%> but your Father <S%G3962><s%> knows <S%G3609><s%> that you need <S%G5535><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things. <S%G3778><s%>
"But seek <S%G2212><s%> for His kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> shall be added <S%G4369><s%> to you.

"Do not be afraid, <S%G5399><s%> little <S%G3398><s%> flock, <S%G4168><s%> for your Father <S%G3962><s%> has chosen <S%G2106><s%> gladly <S%G2106><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> you the kingdom. <S%G932><s%>

"Sell <S%G4453><s%> your possessions <S%G5225><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> to charity; <S%G1654><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> purses <S%G905><s%> which do not wear <S%G3822><s%> out, an unfailing <S%G413><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> thief <S%G2812><s%> comes <S%G1448><s%> near, <S%G1448><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> moth <S%G4597><s%> destroys. <S%G1311><s%>
"For where <S%G3699><s%> your treasure <S%G2344><s%> is, there <S%G1563><s%> will your heart <S%G2588><s%> be also. <S%G2532><s%>
"Be dressed <S%G4024><s%> in readiness, <S%G4024><s%> and [keep] your lamps <S%G3088><s%> alight. <S%G2545><s%>

"And be like <S%G3664><s%> men <S%G444><s%> who are waiting <S%G4327><s%> for their master <S%G2962><s%> when <S%G4219><s%> he returns <S%G360><s%> from the wedding <S%G1062><s%> feast, <S%G1062><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that they may immediately <S%G2112><s%> open <S%G455><s%> [the door] to him when he comes <S%G2064><s%> and knocks. <S%G2925><s%>

"Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are those <S%G1565><s%> slaves <S%G1401><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the master <S%G2962><s%> shall find <S%G2147><s%> on the alert <S%G1127><s%> when he comes; <S%G2064><s%> truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that he will gird <S%G4024><s%> himself [to serve,] and have them recline <S%G347><s%> [at the table,] and will come <S%G3928><s%> up and wait <S%G1247><s%> on them.

"Whether <S%G2579><s%> he comes <S%G2064><s%> in the second <S%G1208><s%> watch, <S%G5438><s%> or <S%G2579><s%> even <S%G2579><s%> in the third, <S%G5154><s%> and finds <S%G2147><s%> [them] so, <S%G3779><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> are those <S%G1565><s%> [slaves].

"And be sure <S%G1097><s%> of this, <S%G3778><s%> that if <S%G1487><s%> the head <S%G3617><s%> of the house <S%G3617><s%> had known <S%G3609><s%> at what <S%G4169><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> the thief <S%G2812><s%> was coming, <S%G2064><s%> he would not have allowed <S%G863><s%> his house <S%G3624><s%> to be broken <S%G1358><s%> into.
"You too, <S%G2532><s%> be ready; <S%G2092><s%> for the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is coming <S%G2064><s%> at an hour <S%G5610><s%> that you do not expect. <S%G1380><s%>"

And Peter <S%G4074><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> are You addressing <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> to us, or <S%G2228><s%> to everyone <S%G3956><s%> [else] as well <S%G2532><s%>?"

And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G686><s%> is the faithful <S%G4103><s%> and sensible <S%G5429><s%> steward, <S%G3623><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> his master <S%G2962><s%> will put <S%G2525><s%> in charge <S%G2525><s%> of his servants, <S%G2322><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> them their rations <S%G4620><s%> at the proper <S%G2540><s%> time <S%G2540><s%>?
"Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is that slave <S%G1401><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> his master <S%G2962><s%> finds <S%G2147><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> doing <S%G4160><s%> when he comes. <S%G2064><s%>
"Truly <S%G230><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that he will put <S%G2525><s%> him in charge <S%G2525><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> his possessions. <S%G5225><s%>

"But if <S%G1437><s%> that slave <S%G1401><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> in his heart, <S%G2588><s%> 'My master <S%G2962><s%> will be a long <S%G5549><s%> time <S%G5549><s%> in coming, <S%G2064><s%>' and begins <S%G757><s%> to beat <S%G5180><s%> the slaves, <S%G3814><s%> <S%G3816><s%> [both] men <S%G3816><s%> and women, <S%G3814><s%> and to eat <S%G2068><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%> and get <S%G3182><s%> drunk; <S%G3182><s%>

the master <S%G2962><s%> of that slave <S%G1401><s%> will come <S%G2240><s%> on a day <S%G2250><s%> when <S%G3739><s%> he does not expect <S%G4328><s%> [him,] and at an hour <S%G5610><s%> he does not know, <S%G1097><s%> and will cut <S%G1371><s%> him in pieces, <S%G1371><s%> and assign <S%G5087><s%> him a place <S%G3313><s%> with the unbelievers. <S%G571><s%>

"And that slave <S%G1401><s%> who knew <S%G1097><s%> his master's will <S%G2307><s%> and did not get <S%G2090><s%> ready <S%G2090><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> act <S%G4160><s%> in accord <S%G4314><s%> with his will, <S%G2307><s%> shall receive <S%G1194><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> lashes, <S%G1194><s%>

but the one who did not know <S%G1097><s%> [it,] and committed <S%G4160><s%> deeds worthy <S%G514><s%> of a flogging, <S%G4127><s%> will receive <S%G1194><s%> but few. <S%G3641><s%> And from everyone <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> has been given <S%G1325><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> shall much <S%G4183><s%> be required; <S%G523><s%> and to whom <S%G3739><s%> they entrusted <S%G3908><s%> much, <S%G4183><s%> of him they will ask <S%G154><s%> all <S%G4057><s%> the more. <S%G4057><s%>
"I have come <S%G2064><s%> to cast <S%G906><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> upon the earth; <S%G1093><s%> and how <S%G5101><s%> I wish <S%G2309><s%> it were already <S%G2235><s%> kindled! <S%G381><s%>
"But I have <S%G2192><s%> a baptism <S%G908><s%> to undergo, <S%G907><s%> and how <S%G4459><s%> distressed <S%G4912><s%> I am until <S%G2193><s%> it is accomplished! <S%G5055><s%>

"Do you suppose <S%G1380><s%> that I came <S%G3854><s%> to grant <S%G1325><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> on earth <S%G1093><s%>? I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, no, <S%G3780><s%> but rather <S%G2228><s%> division; <S%G1267><s%>

for from now <S%G3568><s%> on five <S%G4002><s%> [members] in one <S%G1520><s%> household <S%G3624><s%> will be divided, <S%G1266><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> two, <S%G1417><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> three. <S%G5140><s%>

"They will be divided, <S%G1266><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> son, <S%G5207><s%> and son <S%G5207><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> father; <S%G3962><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> daughter, <S%G2364><s%> and daughter <S%G2364><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> mother; <S%G3384><s%> mother-in-law against <S%G1909><s%> daughter-in-law, and daughter-in-law against <S%G1909><s%> mother-in-law."

And He was also <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to the multitudes, <S%G3793><s%> "When <S%G3752><s%> you see <S%G3708><s%> a cloud <S%G3507><s%> rising <S%G393><s%> in the west, <S%G1424><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> 'A shower <S%G3655><s%> is coming, <S%G2064><s%>' and so <S%G3779><s%> it turns <S%G1096><s%> out.

"And when <S%G3752><s%> [you see] a south <S%G3558><s%> wind <S%G3558><s%> blowing, <S%G4154><s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> 'It will be a hot <S%G2742><s%> day,' and it turns <S%G1096><s%> out [that way.]
